content.rendered:
San Bernardino and Riverside Region

If you are looking to complete your bachelor’s degree or take the next step in your career with a master’s degree, the San Bernardino and Riverside Region offers flexible schedules that allow you to work full-time as you complete your coursework, usually one to two classes per session.

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Business Administration, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS
  • Health Administration, BS
  • Public Administration, BS
  • Educational Studies, BA (Cohort based offsite.)
  • Child Development, BS (Cohort based offsite.)

Graduate Programs

  • Master of Business Administration (MBA)
  • Leadership and Management, MS (MSLM)
